thread.title: Meghana Raj confirms relationship with Chiranjeevi Sarja?
thread.title_full: Meghana Raj confirms relationship with Chiranjeevi Sarja? - The Times of India

author: Sunayana Suresh
title: Meghana Raj confirms relationship with Chiranjeevi Sarja?
text:
Sandalwood insiders have, for a long time, been saying that actors Chiranjeevi Sarja and Meghana Raj are a couple. But neither of them has confirmed this and both have always brushed off or negated this topic whenever asked by fans or the media.
Yesterday, Meghana took to her micro-blogging account to wish actor Dhruva Sarja, Chiranjeevi's brother, on his birthday by saying, "Happieee happiieee budday bil @DhruvaSarja ... Kushkushi yaagi saada iru! God bless! (sic)" Her calling Dhruva 'bil' has raised a lot of speculation, considering it is usually used as the abbreviation for 'brother-in-law'.
Is a formal announcement in the offing?
